mapper.insert: insert into re_comment_log (items_id, order_no, user_id, shop_id) select b.items_id, a.order_no, a.user_id, a.shop_id from re_user_order a, re_user_order_detail b where a.order_no = b.order_no and a.order_no=#{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
insert into re_comment_log (items_id, order_no, user_id, shop_id) values (#{itemsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into re_comment_log
items_id,
order_no,
user_id,
shop_id,
